name: Dev Dash
description:
Dev Dash is a top-down game where you play as a game developer who's late for work. Dodge cars that appear from the top of the screen by swiping left or right to switch lanes and avoid bumping into traffic. The game is won once you've reached your office!

Notes
Please click on the white fullscreen button, not the blue one!            
This is a prototype for the game so there may be some bugs.

Controls

Switch lanes - Hold left mouse button and drag left or right, then let go to confirm.

Please consider completing this short survey after playing the game:
Go to survey

It will help me a lot!

Discord Server

Dark Wolves is a small, chill, gaming focused community where you can chat about Dev Dash or gaming in general!
Join here --> Dark Wolves Discord Server

Source Code
You can find the source code here: https://github.com/Shadow-Striker/dev-dash
